rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: Serves as the transitional space with ample natural light from floor-to-ceiling windows. Vastu compliant entrance ensuring positive energy flow.

rooms.name: Living Area
rooms.description: Open-plan living area with Scandinavian design aesthetics, featuring a large window wall that enhances daylight and ventilation.

rooms.name: Dining Kitchen Combined Space
rooms.description: Functional space combining dining and kitchen areas. Designed for efficient workflow and natural lighting from adjacent windows.

rooms.name: Library
rooms.description: Quiet study area with built-in shelving and a cozy seating arrangement, benefiting from indirect sunlight to maintain focus.

rooms.name: Bathroom
rooms.description: Essential utilities integrated in the ground floor for convenience, designed with modern fixtures and sound insulation.

openings.description: Provides a seamless transition between spaces.
Floor-to-ceiling window offering expansive natural light and ventilation.
Spacious balcony adjoining the living area, overlooking the west-facing view.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Luxurious bedroom with a generous balcony for relaxation and enhanced air circulation. Designed to capture optimal natural light from south-west windows.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: Cozy guest room with personal balcony space that provides privacy and additional ventilation.

rooms.name: En-suite Bathroom
rooms.description: Modern en-suite bathroom integrated within the master bedroom for convenience.

rooms.name: Study/Office
rooms.description: Multi-purpose room that doubles as a workspace and relaxation area, benefiting from ample natural light.

openings.description: Floor-to-ceiling west-facing windows to ensure consistent daylight throughout the day.
Spacious balcony designed for relaxation with a scenic West view.
Large windows enhancing natural ventilation and light.
Compact balcony offering private outdoor space.
